mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Caton, Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Caton, Franklin Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound left hand. Conical bullet entered palm of the palm passing directly through fracturing metacarpal bone of ring finger. Ring finger amputated by surgeon unknown - From Hospital, Philadelphia . Location Wounded: In action Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Discharged and mustered out .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Caton, Franklin

Gun shot wound left hand. Conical bullet entered palm of the palm passing directly through fracturing metacarpal bone of ring finger. Ring finger amputated by surgeon unknown - From Hospital, Philadelphia
